Package com.dkriesel.snipe.neuronbehavior

Contains several neuron behaviors, which are generalized activity functions, as well as an interface to implement customized ones.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
NeuronBehavior Defines the interface for a neuron behavior, which denotes the generalization of activity functions.
 

Class Summary
Fermi Implements the Fermi Function and its derivative.
Identity Implements the Identity Function and its derivative.
LeakyIntegratorExponential This class implements an exponential leaky integrator.
LeakyIntegratorLinear This class implements a simple linear leaky integrator.
TangensHyperbolicus Implements the Tangens Hyperbolicus and its derivative.
TangensHyperbolicusAnguita This class represents an numerically very simple approximation of the tanh function proposed by Anguita in "Speed Improvement of the Back-Propagation on Current Generation Workstations" by D.
TangensHyperbolicusAnguitaLeCun Like TangensHyperbolicusAnguita, but with scalings analogous to TangensHyperbolicusLeCun.
TangensHyperbolicusLeCun Implements the Tangens Hyperbolicus and its derivative in an optimized form by LeCun: f(x) = 1.7159*tanh((2/3)*x).
 

Package com.dkriesel.snipe.neuronbehavior Description

Contains several neuron behaviors, which are generalized activity functions, as well as an interface to implement customized ones.
